author: SanghyunKo
body:
Updating UL2016 electron & photon energy correction data files (and clean-up old and buggy files), following the [CMS talk thread](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/issue-with-photons-with-1-5-eta-2-0-specific-to-2016prevfp-ul/44247) and in preparation for the potential Run2 ReMiniAOD-ReNanoAOD campaign future (previously, the latest correction files only existed in the private repo [[link](https://github.com/jainshilpi/EgammaAnalysis-ElectronTools/tree/ULSSfiles_correctScaleSysMC)]).

Also a new tag is needed (preferrably V00-03-02 or V00-04-00) to update the files fetched by the [cmsdist/data/cmsswdata.txt](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/blob/IB/CMSSW_14_2_X/master/data/cmsswdata.txt#L76). Once the new tag is created then a couple of more PRs will be followed in cmsdist and cmssw itself to complete the fix.

FYI @cms-sw/egamma-pog-l2 @afiqaize @RSalvatico
title: Update UL2016 electron & photon energy correction data files
